explanation: [0-0] The video shows a silver, peacock-shaped sindooardan box against a blue background. A hand is partially visible at the top of the frame, along with English subtitles in various colors and patterns.
[0-6] Next, two hands gently rotate the box, showcasing its intricate design and craftsmanship. Finally, one hand opens the box, revealing an empty interior.
